TEXT.FORM: @huashetianzu kɤ-ti ci ɣɤʑu. qapri nɯ ɯ-mɤlɤjaʁ ra kɯ-sɤmto kɯ-me ɕti. kɯ-tu me ri, tɕe tɕendɤre ɯ-mi to-rɤt-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕendɤre @chunqiu @zhanguo ɯ-raŋ nɯtɕu pjɤ-ŋu tɕe, nɤkinɯ, @chuguo nɯnɯ rɟɤlkhɤβ nɯtɕu, tɯrme tɯ-tɯpɯ pjɤ-tu, kha ra wuma ʑo pjɤ-mɤɕi-nɯ, pjɤ-pe-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕendɤre tɯ-sŋi tɕe, nɯnɯra ɣɯ, nɤki, nɯ-wa nɯ kɯ, ɯ-ʁjoʁ nɯnɯ ɣɯ ɯ-cha tɯ-tɕhaχɯ ɲɤ-kho ɲɯ-ŋu. (030 ɯ-ʁjoʁ ra ɣɯ nɯ-cha...) tɕe nɯnɯ ɯ-cha ci ɲɤ-kho tɕe tɕeri, nɤkinɯ, cha nɯ pjɤ-rkɯn, tɯrme nɯ pjɤ-dɤn ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, tɕe nɯnɯ kɯ-fse kú-wɣ-tshi tɕe, kɤsɯfse /ɣɯ/ ʑo lú-wɣ-sɯβzi-nɯ mɯ-pjɤ-cha ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕendɤre kɯ-maqhu tɕe to-nɯkrɤz-nɯ. tɕendɤre, nɤki, "mɲirɯri kɯ qapri tɯka rɤt-i, tɕe qapri rɤt-i tɕe tɕetha, ɕɯ ʑa, nɤkinɯ iɕqha nɯ, kɤ-rɤt pɯ-kɯ-sthɯt nɯnɯ kɯ tɕe kɯkicha ki a-kɤ-tshi, (050) kɯki tɯ-fufu ki, cha nɯ lonba a-kɤ-tshi" to-ti. tɕendɤre tɯ-nɯsaχɕɯβ to-ʑa-nɯ tɕe, tɯrme tɯ-rdoʁ kɯ stu kɯ-mɤku ʑo pjɤ-sthɯt. tɕendɤre wuma ʑo kɯ-fse ci kɯ pjɤ-rɤt ɲɯ-ŋu, qapri. (118) tɕeri ku-rtoʁ tɕe, ɯ-zda ra kɯ pɤjkhu kɤ-rɤt mɯ-pjɤ-sthɯt-nɯ tɕe, /ʑe/ ma to-znɤjpɯjpe tɕe, "wo ɲɯ-ɤtsɯtsu ɕti" tɕe, qhe nɤkinɯ, ɲɤ-sɯso tɕe, cha nɯnɯ tshi pjɤ-ŋu. tɕeri ɯ-rkɯ tɯ-rdoʁ nɯ kɯ "haha, nɤkinɯ, kɯki cha ki tɕe aʑɯɣ ɲɯ-βze ɕti." tɕe nɤkinɯ, to-ti tɕe, tshi ʑo pjɤ-ŋu ri, toʁde tɕe nɤkinɯ, tɤ-rʑaʁ mɤʑɯ ɣɤʑu ɕti tɕe, nɯ sɤznɤ nɯ qapri ɣɯ ɯ-mi ci tu-rat-a ɲɯ-ra ɲɤ-sɯso. tɕendɤre ɯ-jaʁ ʁe pɕoʁ nɯtɕu iɕqha cha tɯ-tɕhaχɯ nɯ to-ndo, ɯ-jaʁ χcha nɯ kɯ qapri ɣɯ ɯ-mi to-rɤt. tɕendɤre ɯʑo kɯ nɯra /tu-rɤt kɤ-sthɯt/ (kɤ-rɤt tu-sthɯt) ɕɯŋgɯ tɕe, ɯ-zda ci kɯ kɤ-rɤt to-sthɯt, tɕendɤre ɯ-cha nɯ ɲɤ-nɯsɯkho. ɲɤ-nɯsɯkho tɕe to-ti, "ej, kɯki qapri ɣɯ tɕe, ɯ-mi ɯciqa ʑo kɯ-me ɕti ri, nɤʑo ɯ-mi to-tɯ-rɤt tɕe" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu. "tɕendɤre ɯ-mi tú-wɣ-rɤt tɕe, tɕendɤre qapri mɯ-ɲɯ-rmi ɕti, qapri ɲɯ-maʁ ɕti tɕe, hahaha, kɯki cha ki aʑɯɣ tɕe a-pɯ-nɯ-ŋu ɲɯ-ɬoʁ, aʑɯɣ ɲɯ-βze ɕti." nɯre to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕe cha nɯ ɲɤ-nɯsɯkho qhe cha nɯ ko-nɯ-tshi. tɕendɤre kɯ-mɤku pɯ-kɯ-sthɯt nɯ kɯ ɯ-mi ko-rɤt tɕe, kɯrowɤro to-nɤma tɕe, tɕendɤre cha kɤ-tshi mɯ-pjɤ-ŋgrɯ. tɕendɤre @tangchao nɯtɕu, wuma ʑo kɤ-rɤrɤt kɯ-mkhɤz nɯ, nɤkinɯ, ci pjɤ-tu tɕe, nɯnɯ kɯ, nɯnɯ @shi ci pjɤ-rɤt tɕe, nɯ ɯ-ŋgɯ nɯtɕu @ganchun kɤ-ti ci @shi pɯ-kɤ-rɤt nɯ pjɤ-tu tɕe, nɯ ɯ-ŋgɯ tɕe pjɤ-rɤt tɕe, qapri ɣɯ ɯ-mi kú-wɣ-rɤt tɕe, nɯnɯ kɯ-nɤjtshɯ me" to-ti ɲɯ-ŋu, tɕendɤre iɕqha nɯ, ɯ-mtɕhirme χchoʁe kɯ-tu nɯ laʁma, nɤki, rdardɯl mɯ-ju-sɯɣe cha ma, mɯ-ju-sɯxɕe cha ma, nɤki qapri ɣɯ ɯ-mi kú-wɣ-rɤt ndɤre, tɕendɤre nɤjtshɯ ɲɯ-me ɕti" to-ti. tɕeri li, nɤkinɯ iɕqha nɯ, qapri nɤki... @huashetianzu tu-kɯ-ti ɲɯ-ŋu ri, kukutɕu tɕe nɤki, li @huashezhuzu, tɕe @zhu nɯ @zhuozuo ɣɯ @zhu nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕe nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu. tɕe tɯrme ra kɯ nɯ ɯ-qhu tɕe tɕe @huashetianzu tu-ti-nɯ tɕe, iɕqha ta-ma kɯrowɤro tɤ-kɤ-nɤma tɕe, ɯciqa tɤ-kɤ-sɤpe nɯ... kɯrowɤro tú-wɣ-nɤma qhe, nɯ ɕɯŋgɯ tɤ-kɤ-nɤma nɯ nɤjtshɯ ɲɯ-me ɲɯ-ɕti qhe, mɤɣrɤz mɯ-tu-pe ɲɯ-ɕti kɤ-ti ɲɯ-ŋu.
